title: [Large-scale] Semantic Wiki-Based Collaborative Learning for Foundational Computer Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in computer and internet utilization
context.additional_context: Beginner-Level Introduction to Computer Science for General Citizens, Exploring Everyday-Life-Linked Mathematical Concepts Through Collaborative Learning and Semantic Wikis

learning_goals: Learners can explain core computer science concepts (algorithms, data structures, logical frameworks) using semantic wikis in collaborative learning environments
Learners practice mathematical reasoning-based problem-solving methods three or more times using microlearning materials delivered via mobile devices
Learners collaboratively create and share project deliverables (concept maps, pseudocode writing, etc.) with peer learners through wiki-based knowledge sharing platforms
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
